new revenue." Wedbush's Lou Kerner said the new management structure could prove more nimble than the troika of Eric Schmidt , Page and Sergey Brin , which has been in place for the last decade. What I do think Facebook has shown Google Inc. is that they're moving too slow, Lou Kerner said." Facebook is moving at the speed of light and Google Inc. isn't." Having three people running the company, making the decisions, was slowing it down," he added.

go home. 11.03 am: Two gilded wooden statues of Tutankhamun are among 18 items missing from the Egyptian museum in Cairo, after looters stole several items during the anti-government protests, the Associated Press reports. On January 28, looters climbed a fire escape to the museum roof and lowered themselves on ropes from a glass pane ceiling onto the museum's top floor. Around 70 objects were damaged, but until Sunday's announcement, it was not known whether anything was missing. Antiquities Tony Blair Zahi Hawass said the museum's database department determined 18 objects were gone. Investigators were

Michael Vick was cleared of any wrongdoing- other than using poor judgment for hosting a party open to the public- and in October he told Sports Illustrated that the experience changed him for good. Right then and there I told myself, I am changing my life, Michael Vick told the magazine." I'm going to do everything they ask me to do. I'm getting myself away from this madness."
